original: 曹魏三少帝曹芳的寵妃。曹芳與郭太后不睦，又因立后和郭太后母喪之事更形激化，郭太后一怒之下，殺了曹芳寵妃禺婉和張美人。
text: Cao Fang's favorite concubine, the three emperors of the Wei Dynasty. Cao Fang was at odds with the Queen Mother Guo, and was intensified by the funeral of the Queen Mother and the Queen Mother Guo. In a rage, the Queen Mother killed Cao Fang's favorite consort Yuwan and Zhang Meiren.
